response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which is designed to elevate your experience and bring significant value to your life. This exceptional item is worth more than $8,000 to us, but we're excited to offer it to you at an exclusive price. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, we propose a special offer of $12,000 for this remarkable product. We believe this price reflects not only the value of the product but also the opportunity to make your life better with it. Please let us know if you're interested in exploring this opportunity further.", "product_price": 12000}
